game

Class OriginalBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.OriginalBridge
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvisibleBridge, SpeedingBridge

    public class OriginalBridge
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a straight bridge. It is vertically built by player when the space button is pressed and horizontally falls to connect the Person to the adjacent Isle
    Version:
    5/13
    Author:
    Samantha Sung

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OriginalBridge(double start)
      Initializes the starting x-coordinate, length, angle, and movement variables of the bridge to pre-set values

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Determines what to do depending on whether the bridge is falling or falling all the way (reviving)

      Builds the bridge according to the specified parameter when space key is pressed
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet surface)
      Draws the bridge
      void fall(double path)
      Sets the bridge to falling
      void fallDown()
      Sets fallingAllTheWay to true
      double getEndCoordinate()

      void revive()
